system.description:
Effect: When declaring this attack, this attack has a chance of changing properties until the end of the user's Activation. 
 40% chance: Nothing changes.
30% chance: Power doubles.
10% chance: Power triples.
30% chance: Instead of dealing damage, the targets each heal 4 Ticks of HP.

actions.name: Present
